mil4.5:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil4.5:1.1_0: “Having been smeared with poison. I’ll preparing the hymns that are long-unpracticed spring to mind, let alone those that are practiced.
mil4.5:1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by five?
mil4.5:2.1_0: Sir, a student should know that a student has been sent away. He should not undertake those who are loyal to. Noble they should know moderation in line with the teachings, rehearsing the minds. There are merely regarded as such. And he should know that kind of person has arrived, consent has been brought to those who are eligible.
mil4.5:2.2_0: Sir, these five teachers of teachers. We will practice well. And when they have arisen, they’ll come to me. There will be stopped by me, teachers, and by grief fortune. Outside. I won’t imagine that you can see the Buddhas understood by saying: “May I have been disposeded and penetrated to me with contempt.”
